mapper.select: select count(checkout_entry_serial) from m_checkout_entry where creation_date = date('now', 'localtime') and checkout_entry_serial like #{prefix}||'%'

select checkout_entry_serial, invoice_type, payment_method, payment_number, payment_amount, c.bank_account_id, b.name as bank_account_name, service_fee, c.remark, drawer, is_verified from m_checkout_entry as c join c_bank_account as b on c.bank_account_id = b.bank_account_id where checkout_entry_serial = #{serial}
mapper.update: update m_checkout_entry set payment_method = #{paymentMethod}, payment_number = #{paymentNumber}, payment_amount = #{paymentAmount}, bank_account_id = #{bankAccountID}, service_fee = #{serviceFee}, remark = #{remark}, is_modified = 1 where checkout_entry_serial = #{checkoutEntrySerial}
